sys_remote_update_set.description: What I'd suggest is that we should be able to see tickets that we've submitted and then anyone that reports up through us. So for example, Mike Fulton should be able to see tickets for anyone in Xactware, I should be able to see tickets for anyone in engineering/development, Bill Bowers should be able to see tickets for anyone on iOS Dev, etc. Request is for 3 levels up
sys_remote_update_set.name: HV - STRY0011988 - Need global search in ServiceNow
